text: The main verdict would be the weekly quizzes that are worth 40% of our grade. Quizzes, homework, and the general structure of the class is all over the place. I guess it's also harder to get credit (especially partial credit) on exams since answers are either multiple choice or just input- students can't portray understanding as usual.

and homework is the boyfriend. 
(All jokes aside, I've gotten more organized than ever)
